hazards_data.description: Compilation of Hazards for Star Wars SAGA Edition.

hazards_list.name: Acid
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Acid deals 2d6 points of acid damage when it first comes into contact with a target, and continues to deal damage each round until it is washed off or neutralized. An attack roll of 1d20+5 is made against the target's Fortitude Defense; if successful, the target takes full damage. If the attack misses, the target takes half damage. Treating acid damage requires a DC 15 Treat Injury check and a medical kit.
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each round at start of target's turn

skill_interactions.effect_description: Washes off or treats the acid, ending further damage. Requires a medical kit.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs when target comes into contact with acid. The attack occurs again each round until the acid is washed off or treated.

hazards_list.name: Acid
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, until acid is washed off or treated

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char treats the acid.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object comes into contact w/ acid

hazards_list.name: Acid Pool
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can detect/avoid w/ DC10 Perception check; if check fails, step in pool and do dmg (no atk roll); atks each rnd after first exposure; stops atking when fails atk or is washed off

hazards_list.name: Animal Trap

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves  -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char detects trap before they reach it, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Char successfully disarms the trap.
Char determines which type of creature trap is designed to capture.  For the next hour, char gains +1 bonus to attempts to spot that creature.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that gains persistent condition from this hazard can't move up the CT until it spends at least 1 hour resting in a normal environment.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature enters sq occupied by trap

hazards_list.name: Asteroid Field
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of vehicle's turn, as long as vehicle is w/in area occupied by asteroid field

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char notices asteroids heading toward vehicle.
Char tries to avoid hitting any asteroids for 1 rnd, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to vehicle's Ref Def to avoid incoming rocks.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn in an asteroid field

hazards_list.name: Atgar 1.4 FD P-Tower Light Antivehicle Laser Cannon
Atmosphere, Corrosive

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies presence of corrosive atmosphere.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creatures, droids, or objects that have special protection against corrosive atmosphere, such as environmentally sealed space suits, are not affected by this hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object begins its turn in a corrosive atmosphere

hazards_list.name: Atmosphere, Toxic

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies presence of toxic atmosphere.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creatures, droids, or objects that have special protection against toxic atmosphere, such as environmentally sealed space suits, are not affected by this hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in toxic atmosphere

hazards_list.name: Atmosphere, Vacuum

damage_types: no dmg and target moves -1 step on ct

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char holds breath for 1 rnd, reducing vacuum's atk roll by 10. Each rnd char holds breath, check DC increases by 2.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature can't move back up CT until it's returned to breathable atmosphere.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in vacuum

hazards_list.name: Automated Sentry Gun
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: 2x2 area; add +1 to hit and +1 dmg if within 50sq

hazards_list.name: Avalanche
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target remains w/in area of avalanche

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies weak shelf that could cause avalanche.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk roll exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, target is buried under avalanche.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object w/in area of the hazard fires a wpn that makes noise; targets any creature, droid, or object in area of avalanche

hazards_list.name: Battle Hydra Poison
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of Battle Hydra's turn
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 15 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: Battle Hydra sting

hazards_list.name: Black Hole
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of vehicle's turn, as long as vehicle is w/in area occupied by black hole

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char works diligently to keep the ship from breaking apart, granting the vessel +2 equip bonus to Fort Def against hazard.
Char fights severe pull of gravity and flies the vehicle toward safety, moving 1 sq away from center of hazard.
Char detects black hole on the vehicle's sensors, granting +2 circumstance bonus to crew's Mechanics checks and Pilot checks when dealing w/ hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Event horizon for black hole covers area w/ 10 sq radius (starship scale) centered on black hole's central sq.  W/in event horizon, missiles and torpedoes are ineffective, and atks w/ laser wpns take -20 penalty.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn in the gravity well of black hole

hazards_list.name: Blaster Rifle Turret

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Can use autofire (-5 attack, 2x2 area, half damage on miss for autofire)

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A blaster rifle turret is a CL 3 trap that uses a standard blaster rifle. It has a range equal to that of a blaster rifle and can fire in any direction. It makes one attack per round against the closest target within its line of sight, using an attack bonus of +5. The turret can also use the autofire rules (making an attack against a 2x2 square area at a -5 penalty; targets hit take full damage, targets missed but in the area take half damage). It has darkvision and a +5 bonus on Initiative and Perception checks. It can be targeted and destroyed.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Disable the turret.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Range of a blaster rifle. Typically mounted, with darkvision, Perception +5, Initiative +5. Attacks closest target in LOS once per round. Can be targeted (Reflex Defense 10 + size modifier, hp based on size, DR 5).

hazards_list.name: Blaster Turret
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A simple blaster turret is a CL 2 trap that uses a standard blaster pistol. It has a range equal to that of a blaster pistol and can fire in any direction. It makes one attack per round against the closest target within its line of sight, using an attack bonus of +5. It has darkvision and a +5 bonus on Initiative and Perception checks. It can be targeted and destroyed.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Disable the turret.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Range of a blaster pistol. Typically mounted, with darkvision, Perception +5, Initiative +5. Attacks closest target in LOS once per round. Can be targeted (Reflex Defense 10 + size modifier, hp based on size, DR 5).

hazards_list.name: Blizzard

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char forces themselves to move through the storm, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.
Char identifies blizzard before it reaches them.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Grants concealment to creatures, droids, and objects w/in it.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature starts its turn in a blizzard

hazards_list.name: Brintak Poison
hazards_list.trigger_description: Brintak tentacle hit

hazards_list.name: Building Decompression

damage_types: no dmg and target is pulled 10 sq toward damaged wall section
damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: No dmg and target is pulled 20 sq toward the damaged wall section

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char grabs a stable object as reaction and negates the forced movement. Alternately, if char is already secured, they can grab adjacent char and prevent it from being moved by hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Any creature pulled into same sq as damaged wall or window is sucked out into vacuum by this hazard, and must then face vacuum atmosphere hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A transparisteel window or wall takes at least 20 pts of dmg; targets all creatures w/in room or corridor where the damaged section is located

hazards_list.name: Bundar Root
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Causes short-term memory loss and affects the ability to reason; if atk, is successful, target suffers -5 penalty to all skill checks that rnd; poison atks each rnd until cured w/ successful DC15 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Carbonite Freezing Chamber
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Regardless of whether char takes dmg, they are frozen in carbonite, cannot move or act until unfrozen, and is considered unconscious. Char emerging from carbon freeze has persistent condition and immediately moves -4 steps CT; persistent condition can only be removed after 8 hrs of rest. If char standing adjacent to carbonite freezing chamber takes dmg from melee atk, must make DC15 Acrobatics check to avoid falling in. Control panel to one side activates the freezing process, which takes 1 rnd to complete. Carbonite slab (70 hp; DR10) can be transported through harsh conditions (i.e. vacuum) w/o harming victim inside

hazards_list.name: Cardooine Chills

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Cardooine Chills is a common disease with a CL of 2. It makes a +2 attack against Fortitude Defense. On a hit, it deals 1d6 damage and the target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track. This recurs daily until treated with a DC 15 Treat Injury check.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the disease. Requires a medical kit.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs the first time a character is exposed to the disease. If the initial attack succeeds, the attack occurs again each day the disease remains untreated.

hazards_list.name: Carnivorous Plants
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at end of target's turn, while target is w/in 3 sq of plant

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction, char avoids being grabbed when attacked by plant, but they still take dmg.
Char identifies plant as carnivorous and knows it will atk if they get too close, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
When char begins turn w/in 3 sq of plant, char avoids being detected by plant for 1 rnd.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If plant's atk roll exceeds targets Ref Def by 5 or more, target is grabbed and pulled toward the plant 1 sq/rnd.  If target reaches plant, target is swallowed and can be freed only by destroying the plant (Ref Def 8, Fort Def 14).
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins turn w/in 3 sq of carnivorous plant

hazards_list.name: Carnivorous Plants of Durace

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char makes check as part of move action; if successful, can pass w/in 3 sq of carnivorous plant of Durace during that move action w/o triggering hazard.
Char identifies carnivorous plant.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature or droid reduced to 0 hp by this hazard takes -10 penalty to Endurance checks as long as it remains w/in 3 sq of hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid enter sq w/in 3 sq of carnivorous plant of Durace

hazards_list.name: Cave-In
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target remains w/in area of cave-in

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char tumbles away from debris, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char realizes that rock ceiling might be weak enough to collapse if loud sound occurs w/in cavern.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or vehicle w/in cavern fires wpn that makes noise; targets any creature, droid, or object in area of cave-in

hazards_list.name: Chasms and Pits
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Depth = 2x station's CL sq. Any chasm deep enough to deal fatal dmg can be described as bottomless; if char survives GM can rule that they landed on a ledge or outcropping that prevented a lethal fall

hazards_list.name: Chuba Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Potential to cause strokes; if atk beats Fort Def by 10 or more, target remains at -1 CT until 3 separate and successful DC20 Treat Injury checks

hazards_list.name: Conveyor Belts
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature moving in same direction moves at 2x normal movement rate; creature moving against direction moves at half normal rate. Any creature that steps onto or starts turn on conveyor belt must make DC20 Acrobatics check as free action or be flat-footed until start of next turn

hazards_list.name: Corellian Sand Panther Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 15 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: Sand Panther claw

hazards_list.name: Corrosive Atmosphere
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A corrosive atmosphere (CL 4) attacks any exposed creature or object each round. Attack: +5 vs. Fortitude Defense. Damage: 2d6 acid (half on miss).
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each rnd exposed

hazards_list.name: Crashing Waves

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target is knocked prone and slides 1 sq toward source of waves

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char can make Acrobatics check as a reaction to avoid being knocked prone by the waves.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid w/in area of hazard on the hazards Init count

hazards_list.name: Crowd
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is in crowd

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char predicts the direction in which various elements w/in crowd will move, gaining +5 bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char convinces crowd to clear a path for char and their allies, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: General attitude of crowd can help or hinder efforts of creature trying to move through.  Crowd Attitude worksheet determines the mods that creatures receive on attempts to make their way through crowd.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins turn in the crowd

hazards_list.name: Crowded Skylane
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Pilot may reduce dmg from collision by 1/2 as reaction w/ DC15 Pilot check

hazards_list.name: Crushing Damage
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature being crushed takes dmg each rnd until they make a hard Str check to pry free; hazard that completely encompasses target doesn't need to make atk roll; some crushing hazards (i.e. trash compactor) may not allow creatures to make Str checks

hazards_list.name: Dark Wolf Poison

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: immobilized if moved to bottom of CT

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 10 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: claw or stinger

hazards_list.name: Death Sticks
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: +1 morale to attacks and defenses, -10 to UtF and cannot spend FP's. Lasts 1 hr (-5 mins for each subsequent use). At end, atk +10 vs Fort, target is addicted

hazards_list.name: Dense Smoke
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each rnd exposed; if target has self-contained air supply (e.g. breath mask), suffer no ill effects; fully enclosed speeders don't have sufficient filters to block out atmosphere, but shutting vents cuts atks to every other rnd; objects w/in 12 sq have concealment, objects farther than 12 sq have total concealment; low-light vision doesn't counter concealment

hazards_list.name: Depressurization
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area of depressurization

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char manages to control their breathing despite the decreasing amt of air in the area, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: After 1d6+4 rnds, air is completely vented, changing the hazard to Atmosphere, Vacuum.
hazards_list.trigger_description: An opening is created between outer space and compartment containing creatures; targets any creatures w/in area of depressurization

hazards_list.name: Devaronian Blood-Poison

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: -1 CT can only move at 1/2 speed

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: if atk succeeds target is wracked w/ pain; if target moves to point on CT that would normally reduce speed to 1/2, it's immobilzed; poison atks each rnd until cured w/ successful DC20 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Dioxis

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Dioxis is an inhaled poison (CL 8). Attack: +10 vs. Fortitude Defense. Damage: 4d6 damage and target moves -1 step on the condition track. This recurs each round until treated with a DC 25 Treat Injury check.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the poison.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: This is an inhaled poison. The attack occurs each round a character is exposed to the poison and continues each round after exposure until the poison is cured.

hazards_list.name: Dioxis Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Gas fills 20x20 meter room in 3 rnds

hazards_list.name: Disease, Cardooine Chills

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies disease.
Char treats disease.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Once creature has been exposed to Cardooine chills and disease has been treated, creature can't contract the disease again.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is exposed to disease

hazards_list.name: Disease, Krytos Virus

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies disease.
Treat Injury (DC21 or DC16 w/ bacta tank; req medical kit): Char treats disease.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: The Krytos virus takes -5 penalty to atks against Humans. Once creature has been exposed to Krytos virus and disease has been treated, creature can't contract disease again.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is exposed to disease

hazards_list.name: Dust Devil
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in 3 sq of dust devil

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char reduces effects of being thrown by dust devil's special effect, taking 1/2 dmg if hazard hits and 1/4 dmg if it misses.
Char spots dust devil before it reaches them.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk roll exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, at the end of the rnd, target is sucked into whirlwind and thrown 12 sq. Upon landing, target takes addl 3d8 pts of dmg.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn w/in 3 sq of dust devil

hazards_list.name: Dxun Tomb Beast Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: When creature takes dmg from wpn coated w/ Sith poison or ingests substance tainted w/ Sith poison; whether poison atk succeeds or fails, poison feeds target's anger, drawing it closer to the Dark Side until effect is negated; every time target spends FP, make +12 atk roll against target's Will Def; if atk succeeds, char calls upon the Dark Side and increases its Dark Side Score by 1; every time an atk made by the Sith poison fails, a char can make a DC25 UtF check to neutralize the poison; if poison atk fails 5 consecutive times, poison is auto neutralized
hazards_list.trigger_description: injury

hazards_list.name: Electrified Fence
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is in contact w/ fence

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char tumbles away from fence, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Char leaps over fence w/o taking dmg.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid touches fence

hazards_list.name: Electrified Floors
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature standing on active electrified floor immediately take dmg; if creatures starts turn on electrified floor, floor makes hazard atk, successful atk knocks target prone

hazards_list.name: Explosive Charge

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char disarms explosive charge.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Explosive's timer expires; targets all creatures, droids, and objects in 1 sq burst radius

hazards_list.name: Explosive Trap, Detonite

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char disarms explosive trap.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Explosive's timer expires; targets all creatures, droids, and objects in 1 sq burst radius

hazards_list.name: Exposed Plasma Conduit
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is in area of plasma spill

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char leaps over or away from spilled plasma, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char treats injured creature for plasma burns.
Char slices into control network and diverts plasma flow away from area, negating hazard.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Atk misses target in sq adjacent to exposed conduit, setting it off

hazards_list.name: Extreme Cold

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track (hypothermia).

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Extreme cold (CL 4) forces a Fortitude save (+5 attack bonus) each hour. On a hit, the character takes 2d6 damage and moves -1 persistent step on the condition track due to hypothermia. On a miss, half damage and no condition track movement. Heavy clothing/armor grants +5 equipment bonus to the save. Characters cannot heal or improve condition until 1 hour in normal temperature.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Heavy clothing or armor provides a +5 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense against extreme cold. A character cannot regain Hit Points or improve their condition until they have spent at least 1 hour in a normal environment.

hazards_list.name: Extreme Heat

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track (heatstroke).

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Extreme heat (CL 4) forces a Fortitude save (+5 attack bonus) each hour. On a hit, the character takes 2d6 damage and moves -1 persistent step on the condition track due to heatstroke. On a miss, half damage and no condition track movement. Heavy clothing/armor imposes a -5 penalty to the save. Characters cannot heal or improve condition until 1 hour in normal temperature.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Heavy clothing or armor imposes a -5 penalty to Fortitude Defense against extreme heat. A character cannot regain Hit Points or improve their condition until they have spent at least 1 hour in a normal environment.

hazards_list.name: Extreme Temperatures (vs. vehicles)
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle operates in extreme heat or cold

hazards_list.name: Extreme Temps

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 persistent step on CT

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that has taken dmg from extreme temp can't regain hp or move up the CT until it spends at least 1 hr in normal environment. Hvy clothing or armor provides +5 equip bonus to Fort Def to resist extreme cold but imposes -5 penalty to Fort Def to resist extreme heat.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is exposed to extreme heat or cold

hazards_list.name: Falling Damage

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: If deliberately jumped, first 1d6 is nonlethal damage.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Falling creatures take 1d6 damage per 3 meters fallen (max 20d6). If deliberately jumping, the first 1d6 is nonlethal. Trained Acrobatics or Jump (DC 15) can reduce effective fall distance by 3m; if damage becomes 0, character lands on feet. Falls greater than 60m are treated as 60m for skill-based reduction (CRB Errata p.291).

skill_interactions.effect_description: Reduce effective distance fallen by 3 meters (CRB p.62). If this reduces damage to 0, character lands on feet (CRB Errata p.291).
Reduce effective distance fallen by 3 meters (CRB p.69). If this reduces damage to 0, character lands on feet (CRB Errata p.291).

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: A creature takes 1d6 points of damage for every 3 meters (2 squares) it falls, to a maximum of 20d6 points of damage. If a creature deliberately jumps instead of falling, the damage is the same, but the first 1d6 points of damage are nonlethal damage. Errata (p.291 for CRB p.255): If you are trained in the Acrobatics or Jump skills, you can reduce the damage you take from a fall with a successful skill check (see skill descriptions). If the check succeeds and you take no damage from the fall, you land on your feet. If you fall from a height of greater than 60 meters, treat the fall as being only 60 meters for the purposes of reducing falling distance with these skills.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, colossal
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Colossal falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Colossal object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, gargantuan
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Gargantuan falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Gargantuan object falls into a creature's square or an area.
