hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Huge falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Huge object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, large
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Large falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Large object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, medium
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Medium falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Medium object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, small
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Small falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Small object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falling Objects, tiny
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A Tiny falling object. Makes an area attack. See general Falling Objects rules (CRB p.254) for details on being trapped and forced-downward objects.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Area attack. Object must land wholly or partly in creature's fighting space. If target is 3+ size categories smaller, they might be trapped (DC 15 Acrobatics or Strength check to escape). Objects forced downward deal damage as if two sizes larger. Fine/Diminutive objects usually deal no damage.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A Tiny object falls into a creature's square or an area.

hazards_list.name: Falsin's Rot
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Begins as spore that can take root anywhere on subject's skin, but usually begins on extremities.  Painful, itching lesions form as the fungus multiplies, spreading along limbs onto victim's torso and abdomen. If left alone, will consume subject in less than standard week. Can be treated and cured w/ applications of salves made from local flora and standard medical compounds. If treated early, few signs remain, victims of advanced cases exhibit severe scarring, w/ the worst cases resulting in limb loss. Occurs each day Falsin's rot remains untreated. Char who remains at -3 CT for 2 days as a result of Falsin's rot, permanently loses the use of an affected limb. Treatment reqs DC20 Treat Injury check.

hazards_list.name: Fire

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target catches fire if initial fire damage taken and Fort save failed.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Fire (CL 3) deals damage and can set creatures alight. If a creature takes fire damage, it must make a Fortitude save (fire attacks with +5 bonus for this purpose) or catch fire. A burning creature takes 1d6 fire damage each round at the start of its turn. A creature may use a full-round action to extinguish flames on itself.
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each round at start of turn if on fire
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: A creature that takes fire damage must make a Fortitude save (fire attacks with +5 bonus for this purpose) or catch fire. A creature on fire takes 1d6 fire damage each round at the start of its turn. A creature can put out the flames on itself as a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity.

hazards_list.name: Fire
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Char/creature that takes fire dmg catches fire; occurs each rnd creature is on fire; can put out flames as full-round action

hazards_list.name: Fire
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, until flames are extinguished (full-rnd action)
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object takes fire dmg

hazards_list.name: Flash Flood of Volik
hazards_list.recurrence_description: On initiative (Init +8) each rnd for 10 rnds

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction to being hit by this hazard's atk, the char can make check to keep from being knocked prone.
Char recognizes area as one susceptible to flash flooding.
Char makes check as part of move action, and if successful can swim as normal in flooded area (can only be used after 5 rnds of flooding).

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each rnd that it atks after 1st rnd, hazard gains cumulative +1 bonus to atk rolls. After 3 rnds, water is rushing into area at knee height to Human; after 5 rnds water is at waist height; after 10 rnds water is higher than avg Human's head. After 10 rnds area is effectively flooded, and GMs can either allow heroes to swim as normal or use Flooded River hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Encounter begins, or predetermined rnd # begins (GM's choice)

hazards_list.name: Flash Moss

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies nature of moss, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char spots moss as they draw closer to it, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that is successfully attacked by flash moss is blinded for 1d6 rnds by brilliant flash of light (see SECR pg. 254 for blindness rules).
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or vehicle touches moss w/ enough pressure to set off its defenses, usually by stepping on moss or by hitting it w/ wpns fire; targets all creatures in 6x6 sq area

hazards_list.name: Floating Away

damage_types: but can move normally on its next turn
target moves addl 3 sq in direction it was pushed
damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: No dmg and target moves 6 sq in direction it was pushed and can't move on its next turn unless it has fly speed

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction, char can make check to negate addl movement by grabbing onto something solid. If no stable object is nearby, Climb can't be used.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can move target vertically as well as horizontally. When moved upward, target immediately falls back down to height at which it began w/o taking falling dmg.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid is forcibly moved, such as with Bantha Rush or by a telekinetic Force power

hazards_list.name: Flooded River
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, while target is in river

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char locates narrowest point at which to cross river.  Char and their allies gain +1 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char swims at its normal swim speed, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If river's atk roll exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, target moves downstream 6 sq/rnd, and is unable to control the direction of its movement.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins turn in river

hazards_list.name: Fog, O'reenian

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Vehicle takes dmg as though it had collided w/ another vehicle of Colossal sz

skill_interactions.effect_description: Copilot can use this skill to give vehicle +2 dodge bonus to Ref Def against hazard, warning the pilot about getting too close to rock formation.
As reaction, pilot of vehicle can make check to reduce dmg caused by collision. Successful check causes vehicle to take 1/2 dmg from collision.
As std action, char can use ship's sensors to try and pierce fog and find safe route around jutting plateaus. Success grants +5 circumstance bonus to vehicle's Ref Def against hazard's atks.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle's pilot ends their turn w/ vehicle in space filled by O'reenian fog

hazards_list.name: Forgotten Minefield

damage_types: 2 dmg and target is thrown 3 sq in random direction
damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target is thrown 6 sq in random direction

hazards_list.recurrence_description: On trigger; only once per mine

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char makes check as part of move action; if successful, char can enter sq adjacent to mine during move action w/o triggering hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each mine in forgotten minefield should take up 1 sq. There should be at least 1 mine per hero placed in encounter area, plus addl mines for particularly large battlefields.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid enters sq containing or adjacent to forgotten land mine; targets triggering creature and any creature or droid in sq adjacent to mine

hazards_list.name: Freezing Rain

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char forces themselves to move through the storm, gaining a +5 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.
Char identifies freezing rain before it reaches them.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that gains persistent condition from this hazard can't move up the CT until it spends at least 1 hour resting in a normal environment. Any object exposed to this hazard for at least 1 hr becomes difficult to use because of ice build-up; until the ice is removed, atk rolls and skill checks that involve the use of the affected object take a -2 penalty.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn w/in storm of freezing rain; object w/in hazard is subject to special effect

hazards_list.name: Frozen Lake
hazards_list.recurrence_description: On trigger and on each subsequent rnd at start of target's turn, until target is rescued

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char attempts to leap across the weakened area of ice, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Char locates weakness in frozen surface and surmises that too much weight could cause it to break.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that falls through the ice and is subsequently rescued can't regain hp until it spends at least 1 hr resting in a normal environment.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn on frozen lake; atks all targets in 4x4 sq area centered on the triggering creature

hazards_list.name: Fuel Lines
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: All characters in 4-sq burst affected

hazards_list.name: Gravity Mine, Magnetic
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Ships in 3x3 sq area are pulled from hyperspace and cannot re-enter while in these squares; mine then attaches itself to triggering ship
hazards_list.trigger_description: Starship enters mine's sq or adjacent sq

hazards_list.name: Gravity Mine, Standard
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Ships in 3x3 sq area are pulled from hyperspace and cannot re-enter while in these squares
hazards_list.trigger_description: Starship enters mine's sq or adjacent sq

hazards_list.name: Gravity Trap
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can increase the gravity, reverse the gravity (causing creatures to fall toward ceiling and take dmg based on the distance traveled = height of room), or eliminate gravity. Can be disabled by gaining control of the artificial gravity generators, considered part of the life support systems. Affects all creatures in specifiec area (doesn't discriminate between intruders and station personnel).

hazards_list.name: High Gravity
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Speed: 3/4 (rnd down to nearest sq, min. -1), applies to all modes of movement; Carrying Cap: 1/2, take -2 penalty on Str check to lift or move hvy, unsecured object; Skill Check Bonus: take -2 penalty on Str-based skill checks; Atk Roll Penalty: take -2 penalty on atk rolls unless you are native to high-gravity environments or have Spacehound talent; Dmg from Falling: Roll d8s instead of d6s when calculating falling dmg

hazards_list.name: Icy Cliffs
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target remains on icy cliffs

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char uses tumbling skills to slow their descent, reducing the distance they fall by 3 m.
Char ascends icy cliffs more effectively, gaining a +5 bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char plots course up cliffs that minimizes the effects of the hazard, granting everyone +1 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Any creature or droid that is successfully attacked by hazard loses its grip on the cliffs and falls.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn on icy cliffs

hazards_list.name: Icy Ground

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char leaps over ice, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
When operating wheeled vehicle, char maintains control of vehicle even if hazard's atk is successful.
Using the same technique for moving silently, char can move at half speed and isn't affected by hazard's atk.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Immediately after hazard's successful atk, target is knocked prone, ending its move action. Target must spend move action to stand up. As target attempts to regain its footing, hazard makes AoO against target w/ -5 penalty. If atk is successful, target slips on ice and falls prone again, but takes no extra dmg.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or wheeled vehicle crosses icy ground

hazards_list.name: Incinerators
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Size of small room, accessed through 1-meter-tall door. Std temp during most rnds; every 5 rnds, incinerator flares up

hazards_list.name: Insect Swarm
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by swarm

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies insect swarm.
Char realizes that entering body of water or sealed environment is best way to avoid swarm.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in sq occupied by swarm

hazards_list.name: Irksh Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: YV substance; atks each rnd until cured w/ successful DC28 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Jagged Sinkhole

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: on hit or miss, vehicle becomes mired in jagged sinkhole and can't move w/o assistance

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char recognizes jagged sinkhole.
Using the vehicle's drive systems, char is able to dislodge ship from hazard. This check reqs a move action; if successful, vehicle can move as normal.
The Move Object Force power can be used to pull trapped vehicle out of jagged sinkhole.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Ground vehicle ends its pilot's turn in area of jagged sinkhole, or vehicle lands in area of jagged sinkhole

hazards_list.name: Knobby White Spider Poison

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: immobilized if moved to bottom of CT

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 15 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: Spider sting

hazards_list.name: Knockout Drops

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Knockout drops are an ingested poison (CL 2). Attack: +5 vs. Fortitude Defense. Effect: Target moves -1 step on the condition track. This recurs each round until treated with a DC 15 Treat Injury check.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the poison.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: This is an ingested poison. The attack occurs each round after ingestion until the poison is cured.

hazards_list.name: Korfaise Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Gas fills 20x20 meter room in 3 rnds; speed reduced by 1 sq until target spends 1 rnd outside gas

hazards_list.name: Kouhun Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 25 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: Kouhun bite

hazards_list.name: Kryotin

damage_types: no dmg and target moves -1 step on ct
damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: No dmg and target moves -1 step on CT and gains persistent condition. Until persistent condition is removed, target doubles all CT penalties to Will Def

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies the chemical as the narcotic substance known as kryotin.
Char recognizes the signs that an individual creature is under the effects of kryotin.
Char treats effects of kryotin. This process takes 8 hrs and removes the persistent condition caused by kryotin.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each day that creature w/ persistent condition caused by kryotin goes w/o dose of kryotin, the creature moves -1 step on CT at start of day. After 10 days w/o ingesting kryotin, persistent condition is removed.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Living creature ingests dose of kryotin

hazards_list.name: Krytos Virus

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: The Krytos Virus is a potent disease (CL 5). It makes a +10 attack against Fortitude Defense (+5 against Humans due to their species bonus). On a hit, it deals 2d6 damage and the target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track. This recurs daily until treated with a DC 20 Treat Injury check (DC 15 if using a bacta tank).

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the disease. Using a bacta tank reduces the DC to 15. Requires a medical kit.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs the first time a character is exposed to the disease. If the initial attack succeeds, the attack occurs again each day the disease remains untreated. Humans gain a +5 species bonus on their Fortitude Defense against this disease (effectively reducing the attack bonus to +5 for them).

hazards_list.name: Lava Flow
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is adjacent to lava flow

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char tumbles away from lava, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char jumps over or away from lava, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char can predict how the lava flow will move; char and their allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Any creature, droid, or object touched by the lava catches fire and takes addl 1d6 pts of fire dmg each rnd until fire is extinguished.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object begins its turn adjacent to lava flow

hazards_list.name: Leeches

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on CT

hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn until removed

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char safely removes leeches.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Leeches ignore effects of creature's armor, unless the armor is natural or airtight.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in area occupied by leeches

hazards_list.name: Light Beams
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Successful atk blinds victim for (5-Con mod) rnds (add add'l rnds for neg mods)

hazards_list.name: Liquid Cable Traps
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Commonly installed in door frames and narrow passageways, triggered by tripwire lasers, motion detectors, or other sensors. Trap covers 2x2 area, w/ 1 line bisecting the sq that's the source of the liquid cable. Each creature caught by the trap becomes flat-footed and immobilized. The following rnd, each trapped creature can attempt a DC20 Str check to break free; allies outside the trap can also attempt the Str check.

hazards_list.name: Loose Sand
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by loose sand

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char tumbles through the sand to reach more stable ground, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char attempts to leap out of loose sand, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char notices that the sand appears loose.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk is successful, target is restricted to 1 move action/rnd, but target can't leave its sq because it's unable to find secure footing. If hazard's atk fails, target can leave its sq.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn in loose sand

hazards_list.name: Low Gravity
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Speed: +1/4 (rnd down to nearest sq, min. +1), applies to all modes of movement; Carrying Cap: 2x, gain +2 bonus on Str check to lift or move hvy, unsecured object; Skill Check Bonus: gain +2 circumstance bonus on Str-based skill checks; Atk Roll Penalty: take -2 penalty on atk rolls unless you are native to low-gravity environments or have Spacehound talent; Dmg from Falling: Roll d4s instead of d6s when calculating falling dmg

hazards_list.name: Low-Hanging Branches

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char detects branches as they approach, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid them.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: For targets riding on a creature or in a vehicle that doesn't provide total cover, hazard's dmg is 2d10x2.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature enters sq in which hazard is located

hazards_list.name: Madness of Knowledge
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: The 1st time a char rds a Sith tome, scroll, or tablet, make atk; until the persistent condition is removed, char takes -5 penalty to Will Def (on top of normal CT penalty); until the persistent condition is removed, char is filled w/ paranoia and creeping insanity, any time char rolls a natural 1 on atk, next atk made before the end of the encounter must be against an ally; persistent condition can be removed after 8 hrs of rest w/ a DC25 Treat Injury check (char affected can't make Treat Injury check on themself)

hazards_list.name: Malfunctioning Blast Door

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char dives through opening, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char fixes blast door so that it no longer operates erratically.
Char bypasses controls for the blast door and forces it to remain open.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each rnd, blast door opens on random init count and closes on another random init count; the GM makes each Init check for the door.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid attempts to move through blast door while its open

hazards_list.name: Mantellian Savrip Poison

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: immobilized if moved to bottom of CT

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cured with DC 15 Treat Injury
hazards_list.trigger_description: Savrip bite

hazards_list.name: Meteor Shower

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction to meteor shower's atk, pilot of vehicle can make check to grant +2 dodge bonus to Ref Def against meteor shower's atks until start of next turn.
Char identifies impending meteor shower w/ vehicle sensors.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn in area affected by meteor shower

hazards_list.name: Meteorite Storm

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction to meteorite storm's atk, can make check to gain +2 dodge bonus to Ref Def against meteorite storm's atk until start of next turn.
Char identifies impending meteorite storm.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn in area affected by meteorite storm

hazards_list.name: Micrometeor Shower
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of vehicle's turn, as long as vehicle is w/in area occupied by micrometeor shower

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char configures shields to "double front""
granting vehicle +5 equip bonus to Fort Def against hazard."

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn w/in micrometeor shower

hazards_list.name: Nebula

skill_interactions.effect_description: For 1 hr, char staves off effects of nebula dust and gases.  Char can attempt another check each hr for as long as vehicle remains w/in nebula.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Dust and gases from nebula might affect vehicle's systems.  If hazard's atk roll exceeds vehicle's Fort Def by 5 or more, one of vehicle's systems (GM's choice) becomes unavailable and can't be repaired until vehicle leaves nebula.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn in nebula

hazards_list.name: Null Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Gas fills 20x20 meter room in 3 rnds; after 1 min of exposure creatures is affected as if in a vacuum and must deal with the effects of suffocation

hazards_list.name: Obah Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Gas fills 20x20 meter room in 3 rnds

hazards_list.name: Orbital Defense Mines
hazards_list.recurrence_description: On trigger, then on initiative (Init +8) for 5 rnds

skill_interactions.effect_description: As reaction, vehicle's pilot can make check to reduce dmg caused by exploding orbital defense mine. If check is successful, dmg taken is reduced by 1/2 (if vehicle is already taking 1/2 dmg from attack, it instead takes 1/4 dmg).

Char can make check to detect presence of mines. Furthermore, as std action, char can use this skill to use vehicle's sensors to detect mines, granting vehicle +2 dodge bonus to Ref Def against mines' atks.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: This hazard assumes triggering vehicle is passing through the thick net of security satellites surrounding the whole planet. GM can also choose to have orbital defense mines only cover certain sq; in such a case, mines trigger when vehicle enters sq or adjacent sq of orbital defense mine, and there is no recurrence.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle attempts to enter O'reenian atmosphere

hazards_list.name: Paralytic Poison

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Paralytic poison is an injury poison (CL 5). Attack: +10 vs. Fortitude Defense. Effect: Target moves -1 step on the condition track. A target moved to the bottom of the condition track by this poison is immobilized but not unconscious. This recurs each round until treated with a DC 15 Treat Injury check.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the poison.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: This is an injury poison. A target moved to the bottom of the condition track by this poison is immobilized but not unconscious. The attack occurs each round after exposure until the poison is cured.

hazards_list.name: Pit/Sinkhole

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char twists to grab edge of hole, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid falling in.
As char falls into hole, they grab the wall and slow their descent, reducing the amt of dmg the char takes by 1/2.
By jumping across opening of hole, char gains +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid falling in.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk against target is successful, target falls into hole and takes falling dmg when it hits bottom.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object ends its movement in sq occupied by pit or sinkhole

hazards_list.name: Poison, Dioxis
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn until treated

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char treats the poison.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is exposed to poison

hazards_list.name: Poison, Knockout Drops
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn until treated

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char treats the poison.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature ingests poison

hazards_list.name: Poison, Paralytic
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn until treated

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char treats the poison.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature moved to bottom of CT by this poison is immobilized but doesn't fall unconscious.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creatures is injected w/ poison

hazards_list.name: Power Conduit
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: All objects w/in 2 sq are affected

hazards_list.name: Power Diffusion Tunnels
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Every 3 rnds, a burst of energy passes from one end of the tunnel to the other. Firing a wpn at one of the buffers (10 hp) causes any creature w/in 6 sq of the damaged buffer takes normal dmg; the next time an energy burst travels through the tunnel, any creature w/in 6 sq of the damaged buffer takes 2x dmg; damaging a tunnel immediately sets off an alarm and summons a crew of technicians to investigate.

hazards_list.name: Production Assembly Line
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as the target is w/in area of assembly line

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char twists and rolls between the mechanisms, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char sabotages equip as they move through it, imposing a -5 penalty to hazard's atks.
Slicing into controls, char shuts down the assembly line.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk roll exceeds the target's Ref Def by 5 or more, target becomes pinned on assembly line. The hazard gains a +5 bonus to atk rolls against target until target escapes being pinned.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn w/in area of assembly line

hazards_list.name: Quicksand

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char detects quicksand before they reach it, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard. This bonus stacks w/ bonus they receive from successful Survival check against hazard.
Char determines boundaries of quicksand and gains +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard. This bonus stacks w/ bonus they receive from successful Perception check against hazard.
Char escapes from quicksand at end of rnd.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature caught in quicksand sinks into it over period of 5 rnds. If creature fully sinks into quicksand, it can hold its breath for # rnds = Con score before it must begin making Endurance checks to continue holding its breath (SECR pg. 66).
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in sq occupied by hazard

hazards_list.name: Quongoosh Essence
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Target moved to Helpless on CT by poison becomes blind but not unconscious or otherwise helpless; all targets have concealment from blind creature; atks each rnd until cured w/ successful DC15 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Radiation, Extreme

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Extreme Radiation (CL 10 from Table 14-3) attacks with a +10 bonus against Fortitude Defense each round of exposure. On a hit, it deals 8d6 radiation damage and the target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track. Radiation damage ignores DR and SR. Treat Injury DC 30 to cure.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the radiation poisoning.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Radiation damage ignores Damage Reduction and Shield Rating. Occurs each round a character is exposed. A character who dies from radiation exposure can be revived, but the radiation poisoning must still be treated separately.

hazards_list.name: Radiation, Mild
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Ignores DR and SR; occurs each rnd exposed; DC15 Treat Injury check to cure; can revive creature that dies from exposure, but that doesn't remove radiation, which must be treated separately

hazards_list.name: Radiation, Moderate

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Moderate Radiation (CL 4 from Table 14-3) attacks with a +2 bonus against Fortitude Defense each round of exposure. On a hit, it deals 4d6 radiation damage and the target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track. Radiation damage ignores DR and SR. Treat Injury DC 20 to cure.

skill_interactions.effect_description: Cures the radiation poisoning.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Radiation damage ignores Damage Reduction and Shield Rating. Occurs each round a character is exposed. A character who dies from radiation exposure can be revived, but the radiation poisoning must still be treated separately.

hazards_list.name: Radiation, Severe
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Ignores DR and SR; occurs each rnd exposed; DC25 Treat Injury check to cure; can revive creature that dies from exposure, but that doesn't remove radiation, which must be treated separately

hazards_list.name: Rakghoul Disease
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If bitten by rakghoul, make initial atk; if initial atk successful, target is infected; if infected, disease atks every 5 min.; after 3 successful atks, target transforms into a rakghoul; cured w/ DC25 Treat Injury check w/ access to rakghoul serum
hazards_list.trigger_description: Rakghoul bite

hazards_list.name: Rakghoul Disease
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If bitten by rakghoul, make initial atk; if initial atk successful, target is infected; if infected, disease atks every 5 min.; after 3 successful atks, target transforms into a rakghoul; cured w/ DC25 Treat Injury check w/ access to rakghoul serum
hazards_list.trigger_description: Rakghoul bite

hazards_list.name: Repulsortrain Couplers
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: All creatures w/in 4 sq are affected

hazards_list.name: Rising Water
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Every minute, once the water lvl is at least 1 sq deep

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char resists urge to breathe when submerged and gains +2 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.
Char spots opening through which air is escaping, which indicates a way out of the cavern.
Char moves through water, gaining +1 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Water lvl rises 1 sq/min (10 rnds) until cavern is filled w/ water. Creatures w/in filled cavern must hold their breath or begin drowning.
hazards_list.trigger_description: A torrent of water begins pouring into the cavern; targets any creature in area of rising water

hazards_list.name: Rock Slide
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by rock slide

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char determines from surroundings that area might be unstable. A minor seismic quake, a shot from a blaster bolt, or an explosive could cause a rock slide.
After observing area, char finds a few places where they could take cover during rock slide, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid w/in area of hazard fires wpn that makes noise; targets any creature, droid, or object in area of rock slide

hazards_list.name: Rocky Ground
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by rocky ground

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char leaps over rubble, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Using the same technique used for moving silently, char slows their movement to 1/2 speed to avoid taking dmg.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk against target succeeds, target falls prone. If hazard's atk exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, target falls prone and moves 1 sq backward.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn on rocky ground

hazards_list.name: Rough Waters

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies presence of rough waters and recognizes the hazard's effects on swimming creatures and aquatic vehicles.
Pilot of aquatic vehicle affected by rough waters can make a Pilot check as reaction to avoid the rough waters.
Char can make Swim check as reaction to avoid effects of rough waters.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn swimming in the area of the hazard, or the pilot of an aquatic vehicle starts their turn in the area of the hazard

hazards_list.name: Sandstone Pillars
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each time target reaches a new pillar

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char works to keep their balance while moving from pillar to pillar, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
As char leaps to next stone pillar, they aim for the center to avoid destabilizing it. By doing so, the char gains +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char spots possible weakness in pillar ahead and avoids it, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Line of 1d4+2 pillars creates path to other side of ravine.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn on pillar

hazards_list.name: Sandstorm

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char determines that the incoming cloud is a violent sandstorm, and all members of the grp gain +1 circumstance bonus to Fort Def against hazard.
Char detects sandstorm before it reaches them.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Sandstorm grants concealment to creatures and objects w/in it. Any target wearing sealed protective suit is not affected by this hazard.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object begins its turn in sandstorm

hazards_list.name: Sarlacc Pit
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by sarlacc pit

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char avoids sarlacc's tentacles, but they still take dmg from atk.
Char manages to climb 1 sq closer to edge of pit.
Char identifies sarlacc pit before they reach it, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard's atks.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, sarlacc grabs target and pulls it to bottom of pit 2 sq/rnd. If target reaches bottom of pit, it's ingested.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in sq occupied by hazard

hazards_list.name: Scavenged Supplies

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char recognizes that supplies are tainted.
Char treats effects of tainted supplies.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature consumes food or water scavenged from surface of Durace w/o first purifying it

hazards_list.name: Sea Monster Tentacle

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies telltale signs of sea predator nearby and can tell that the area is hazardous.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creatures hit and damaged by hazard are grabbed by tentacle and can attempt to escape as normal. Any creature that's both grabbed and either reduced to 0 hp or rendered unconscious is consumed by the sea monster.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Each rnd, on initiative (Init +11); 1 atk per creature in area of hazard

hazards_list.name: Set Explosive (Detonite)
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A set Detonite charge (CL 2) makes a +10 area attack vs. Reflex Defense to all in a 1-square blast radius, dealing 5d6 damage (half on miss). Setting requires DC 15 Mechanics (1 min); disarming is DC 20 Mechanics (full-round). Attaching to target means automatic hit. (Explosive stats CRB p.131)
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Any creature or object to which the explosive is attached is automatically hit. Mechanics DC 15 to set (1 minute), DC 20 to disarm (full-round action).

hazards_list.name: Set Explosive (Explosive Charge)
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A set explosive charge (CL 5) makes a +10 area attack vs. Reflex Defense to all in a 2-square blast radius, dealing 10d6 damage (half on miss). Setting requires DC 20 Mechanics (1 min); disarming is DC 25 Mechanics (full-round). Attaching to target means automatic hit. (Explosive stats CRB p.131)
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Any creature or object to which the explosive is attached is automatically hit. Mechanics DC 20 to set (1 minute), DC 25 to disarm (full-round action).

hazards_list.name: Shaped Gundark, Poison
hazards_list.trigger_description: Gundark bite

hazards_list.name: Shattering Avka Eggs

skill_interactions.effect_description: Until end of this movement, char can enter sqs adjacent to unexploded avka egg w/o triggering hazard.
Char recognizes the rocky outcroppings as avka eggs, and knows the young inside can break out violently.
Char notices there are creatures w/in stone outcroppings waiting to emerge.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each time an avka egg is triggered, place an avka young in space the egg once occupied.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature enters sq adjacent to avka egg

hazards_list.name: Shock Locks
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can be placed on anything w/ a door. Any char who makes a Mechanics check on a door w/ a shock lock takes dmg. Moderate Perception check to notice shock lock, moderate Mechanics check to disconnect it. Occassionally, shock locks are installed in control panels and can be deactivated only by someone who first enters an authorization code. A shock lock installed for this purpose is usually built directly into the panel, making it undetectable. Some shock locks are designed not only to deliver a shock to the person attempting to use the control panel but also to short circuit and disable the panel.

hazards_list.name: Sinkhole
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can detect/avoid w/ DC10 Perception check

hazards_list.name: Sith Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: When creature takes dmg from wpn coated w/ Sith poison or ingests substance tainted w/ Sith poison; whether poison atk succeeds or fails, poison feeds target's anger, drawing it closer to the Dark Side until effect is negated; every time target spends FP, make +12 atk roll against target's Will Def; if atk succeeds, char calls upon the Dark Side and increases its Dark Side Score by 1; every time an atk made by the Sith poison fails, a char can make a DC25 UtF check to neutralize the poison; if poison atk fails 5 consecutive times, poison is auto neutralized

hazards_list.name: Smoke
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each rnd exposed; grants concealment to chars w/in it

hazards_list.name: Smoke
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Smoke grants concealment to creatures and objects w/in it.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in smoke

hazards_list.name: Solar Wind
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of vehicle's turn, as long as vehicle is exposed to solar wind

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char detects solar flare and predicts imminent solar wind.
Char configures vehicle's shields to better protect it from hazard, granting +5 equip bonus to vehicle's Fort Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each creature inside vehicle takes 1/2 dmg from radiation if hazard's atk is successful and no dmg on miss.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn exposed to solar wind

hazards_list.name: Space Minefield
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of vehicle's turn, as long as vehicle is w/in area occupied by minefield

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char dodges mines as they pass through the field, granting +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard for the rnd.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: 1 sq of space can contain up to 1d6+3 space mines, but only 1 atk occurs per ship per sq.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn w/in space minefield

hazards_list.name: Space Objects, Dense
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Sq. that contains asteroids, debris or other objects reqs 2 sq of movement to enter sq that contains such an object hazard; any vehicle passing thru asteroids or debris must succeed at Pilot check DC35 or take collision dmg; sq that contains asteroids or debris provides cover (+5 cover bonus to Ref Def) against any atks passing thru or into sq; vehicle traffic functions similarly: sq are dense if you move against traffic; unless a particular vehicle is significant for some reason, not necessary to use normal vehicle combat stats to represent their movement or effects of collision

hazards_list.name: Space Objects, Moderate
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Sq. that contains asteroids, debris or other objects reqs 2 sq of movement to enter sq that contains such an object hazard; any vehicle passing thru asteroids or debris must succeed at Pilot check DC25 or take collision dmg; sq that contains asteroids or debris provides cover (+5 cover bonus to Ref Def) against any atks passing thru or into sq; vehicle traffic functions similarly: sq are moderate if you move thru traffic; unless a particular vehicle is significant for some reason, not necessary to use normal vehicle combat stats to represent their movement or effects of collision

hazards_list.name: Space Objects, Sparse
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Sq. that contains asteroids, debris or other objects reqs 2 sq of movement to enter sq that contains such an object hazard; any vehicle passing thru asteroids or debris must succeed at Pilot check DC15 or take collision dmg; sq that contains asteroids or debris provides cover (+5 cover bonus to Ref Def) against any atks passing thru or into sq; vehicle traffic functions similarly: sq are sparse if you move w/ traffic; if you move w/ flow of traffic at same speed, gain +10 circumstance bonus on Pilot check to avoid collision; unless a particular vehicle is significant for some reason, not necessary to use normal vehicle combat stats to represent their movement or effects of collision

hazards_list.name: Space Sickness

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on CT

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char removes persistent condition.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Persistent condition is removed from a creature after 8 hrs rest.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is exposed to weightlessness

hazards_list.name: Space: Damaging Environment, Heavy
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Corrosive Gases: Ignore target's SR (but not DR) when dealing dmg. Might also provide poor visibility. Dust Clouds: Usually encountered as part of an asteroid field or planetary ring system. Provide very poor visibility. Deal no dmg if vehicle doesn't move, but deal +1 die of dmg for every sq of movement. Ionic Discharges: Deals ion dmg to all vehicles w/in affected sqs. Radiation: Extend to all sq on battle grid, but GM can designate some sqs as being in the shadow of planet or moon.

hazards_list.name: Space: Damaging Environment, Light
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Corrosive Gases: Ignore target's SR (but not DR) when dealing dmg. Might also provide poor visibility. Dust Clouds: Usually encountered as part of an asteroid field or planetary ring system. Provide poor visibility. Deal no dmg if vehicle doesn't move, but deal +1 die of dmg for every sq of movement. Ionic Discharges: Deals ion dmg to all vehicles w/in affected sqs. Radiation: Extend to all sq on battle grid, but GM can designate some sqs as being in the shadow of planet or moon.

hazards_list.name: Space: Damaging Environment, Moderate
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Corrosive Gases: Ignore target's SR (but not DR) when dealing dmg. Might also provide poor visibility. Dust Clouds: Usually encountered as part of an asteroid field or planetary ring system. Provide poor visibility. Deal no dmg if vehicle doesn't move, but deal +1 die of dmg for every sq of movement. Ionic Discharges: Deals ion dmg to all vehicles w/in affected sqs. Radiation: Extend to all sq on battle grid, but GM can designate some sqs as being in the shadow of planet or moon.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Frequent and light
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Frequent and moderate
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Frequent and severe
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Often and light
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Often and moderate
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Often and severe
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Rare and light
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Rare and moderate
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Space: Periodic Damage, Rare and severe
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Affects only certain sqs and auto dmgs any target w/in 1 sq of those sqs. Always occur on Init 10.

hazards_list.name: Speeder Traffic
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is in speeder traffic

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char weaves and tumbles through traffic, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char jumps out of way of oncoming speeder or makes an effort to leap from one speeder to another, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char watches carefully for oncoming speeders, gaining +1 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn in speeder traffic

hazards_list.name: Spiner Plant

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char identifies spiner plant.
Char spots spiner plant before it atks, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char harvests plant w/o setting off its defense mechanism, gaining +5 bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Thorns of plant deliver toxin.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature touches the plant

hazards_list.name: Spiner Plant Toxin

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target moves -1 step on CT and gains persistent condition

skill_interactions.effect_description: Persistent condition caused by toxin is removed.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature is hit by atk of spiner plant hazard

hazards_list.name: Storm over Durace
hazards_list.recurrence_description: On trigger; descending through storm takes 3 rnds

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char reduces # of rnds it takes to pass through storm by 1 rnd

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle begins its turn in storm over Durace

hazards_list.name: Strangle Vines
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by vines

skill_interactions.effect_description: If char is being choked by strangle vines, for 1 rnd they take only 1/2 dmg and don't move on CT.
Char identifies strangle vines. As result, char and their allies gain +1 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard's atk exceeds target's Ref Def by 5 or more, vines wrap around target's neck and begin choking victim.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn w/in area occupied by vines

hazards_list.name: Sucking Mud
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by sucking mud

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char leaps over patch of mud, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char spots sucking mud, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Char knows technique to escape from mud more easily, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Str check to free themselves from mud.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: If hazard successfully atks creature, target becomes stuck in mud and can't move from its current sq until it succeeds on DC15 Str check.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn in the sucking mud

hazards_list.name: Surface Power Coupling
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Must destroy power coupling w/ successful ranged atk against Ref Def 25 dealing at least 15 pts of dmg while flying through the tongs

hazards_list.name: Swamp Gas

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char rolls away from swamp gas as it ignites, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char recognizes presence of swamp gas.

hazards_list.trigger_description: A spark or fire-starting energy source, such as a blaster bolt, comes into contact w/ swamp gas; targets all creatures, droids and objects in 2x2 sq area

hazards_list.name: Thornbushes
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, while target is in thornbushes

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char jumps over thornbushes, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def to avoid hazard.
Char locates part of bushes that are less densely packed w/ thorns, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char minimizes their contact w/ thorns while moving through bushes. As char moves, their speed is reduced by 1/2 and char takes 1/2 dmg from successful atk by thorns (no dmg from miss).

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Hazard can be avoided by cutting through thornbushes w/ edged tool, melee wpn, or lightsaber.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in thornbushes

hazards_list.name: Tibanna Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs when target enters gas; gas cloud can be dissipated by firing a blaster bolt into it, causing it to burn up and cause energy dmg to any creature in or adjacent to gas

hazards_list.name: Toxic Atmosphere

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A toxic atmosphere (CL 6) attacks any exposed creature each round. Attack: +5 vs. Fortitude Defense. Damage: 1d6 damage and target moves -1 persistent step on the condition track.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each rnd exposed

hazards_list.name: Toxic Atmosphere
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each rnd exposed; if target has self-contained air supply (e.g. breath mask), suffer no ill effects; fully enclosed speeders don't have sufficient filters to block out atmosphere, but shutting vents cuts atks to every other rnd

hazards_list.name: Tranquilizer drops
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Ingested; occurs each rnd until cured w/ DC20 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Trap Door
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Medium Perception check to notice. Creature moving onto active trap door must make moderate Climb check to catch themselves or fall to another location (usually a holding cell or secure location; or incinerator, garbage smasher or airlock). Climbing back up to the hatch requries moderate Climb check to scale the smooth inner walls of chute. Most trap doors activate automatically, but some are triggered by commands issued at computer terminals in security control rooms.

hazards_list.name: Trash Compactor
hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: A trash compactor (CL 10) is a deadly trap. Its walls take 10 rounds to close. Once closed, it automatically deals 10d6 bludgeoning damage each round for 5 rounds to anything inside. The walls then retract over 10 rounds.
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Every round for 5 rounds once walls fully close
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Takes 10 rounds for the walls to close completely. Once closed, deals automatic damage each round for 5 rounds. After 5 rounds of crushing, the walls retract, taking another 10 rounds to open fully.

hazards_list.name: Trash Compactor
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: A trash compactor takes 10 rnds to close, remains closed for 5 rnds, and takes 10 rnds to open fully once more.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature, droid, or object begins its turn inside a trash compactor that has closed completely

hazards_list.name: Trauger Gas
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Gas fills 20x20 meter room in 3 rnds

hazards_list.name: Trihexalon
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Atks each rnd until cured w/ successful DC30 Treat Injury check; creature that takes full dmg from trihexalon loses limb in contact w/ poison (roll randomly if contact is not otherwise determined)

hazards_list.name: Trihexalon Poison
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Can be made to react (or fail to react) w/ certain biochemical compositions; contact poison (target must be dmged by wpn to which its applied); atks each rnd until cured w/ DC15 Treat Injury check

hazards_list.name: Turret, Blaster

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char makes Stealth check opposed by the turret's Perception check (+5, darkvision).  If char's check is successful, char isn't noticed by turret.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Turret detects creature or droid w/in its LOS

hazards_list.name: Turret, Blaster Rifle

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char makes Stealth check opposed by the turret's Perception check (+5, darkvision).  If char's check is successful, char isn't noticed by turret.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Turret detects creature or droid w/in its LOS; targets all creatures in a 2x2 sq area

hazards_list.name: Underground Rapids
hazards_list.recurrence_description: Each rnd at start of target's turn, as long as target is w/in area occupied by rapids

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char tumbles across rocks to avoid the water, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against rapids.
Char leaps from rock to rock to avoid the water, gaining +2 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.
Char determines which rocks are least affected by rushing water and offer the most stable footing, gaining +5 circumstance bonus to Ref Def against hazard.

hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn in path of underground river

hazards_list.name: Undertow

damage_types: target is pulled 3 sq and is not immobilized
damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target is pulled 6 sq deeper underwater, and is immobilized until the start of its next turn

skill_interactions.effect_description: Char can make Swim check as reaction to keep from being affected by undertow.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Creature that is pulled underwater by undertow begins to drown (see Endurance, SECR pg. 66).
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature begins its turn swimming in deep water

hazards_list.name: Vacuum

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: Target moves -2 steps on the condition track.

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: Target moves -1 step on the condition track.

hazards_list.full_text_description_from_book: Exposure to vacuum (CL 8) is extremely dangerous. Each round, it attacks with a +20 bonus against Fortitude Defense. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 damage and moves -2 steps on the condition track. On a miss, the target moves only -1 step on the condition track. These effects recur each round of exposure. Condition track penalties from vacuum cannot be recovered until the character is in a breathable atmosphere. Unconscious characters in vacuum take cumulative 1d6 damage per round, dying if this damage meets or exceeds their damage threshold.
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Occurs each round a character is exposed to vacuum. A character cannot move back up the condition track until returned to a breathable atmosphere. A character knocked unconscious by vacuum automatically takes cumulative 1d6 damage each round (1d6 first round, 2d6 second, etc.); if this damage ever equals or exceeds the character's damage threshold, the character dies.

hazards_list.name: Vehicle Collision
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Avoid collision with Pilot DC 15. See "Char.Creation & Sizes"" tab in Saga Index for damage"
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle moves into occupied space or vice-versa

hazards_list.name: Vehicle Collision: Mobile Hazard
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Avoid collision with Pilot DC 15. See "Char.Creation & Sizes"" tab in Saga Index for damage"
hazards_list.trigger_description: Hazard moves into vehicle space

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Cannot avoid collision; deal double damage by using all-out movement. See "Char.Creation & Sizes"" tab in Saga Index for damage"
hazards_list.trigger_description: Vehicle attempts ram

hazards_list.trigger_description: Viper Kinrath sting

damage_on_miss_or_save.additional_effects_text: immobilized if moved to bottom of CT

hazards_list.trigger_description: Vornskr tail

hazards_list.name: Whirlpool

damage_on_hit.additional_effects_text: target is moved 2 sq in direction of GM's choice

skill_interactions.effect_description: Pilot of aquatic vehicle caught in whirlpool can make check as reaction to avoid whirlpool.
Char can make check as reaction to avoid effects of whirlpool.

hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Each sq w/in area of whirlpool is considered difficult terrain.
hazards_list.trigger_description: Creature or droid begins its turn in area of hazard, or pilot of aquatic vehicle starts their turn in area of hazard

hazards_list.name: Wind Tunnels & Exhaust Vents
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: When the fans blow, all creatures in tunnel must make medium Acrobatics check or be knocked prone. Creatures moving against wind move at only 1/2 normal movement rate. Fans deal normal dmg to any creature that comes into contact w/ them.

hazards_list.name: Zero Gravity
hazards_list.special_qualities_and_rules: Space Sickness: See TUR Space Sickness Hazard; Speed: gains fly speed = base land speed or retains natural fly speed (whichever is greater), movement is limited to straight lines, can change course only by pushing away from larger objects (i.e. bulkheads); Carrying Cap: 10x, gain +10 circumstance bonus on Str check to lift or move hvy, unsecured object; Skill Check Bonus: gain +2 circumstance bonus on Str-based skill checks; Atk Roll Penalty: take -5 penalty on atk rolls and skill checks unless you are native to zero-g environments or have Spacehound talent; Long-Term Exposure: creature that spends 120 hrs or more in zero-g moves -2 persistent steps on CT upon returning to normal gravity, can't be removed unless char spends at least 24 hrs in normal gravity
